sentences.en: Both kinds of plate boundary are associated with fault systems, earthquakes and volcanism, but the kinds of geologic activity observed at the two boundaries are quite different.
sentences.cn: 两种板块边界均与地层系统、地震以及火山活动有关，但在两种边界处观察到的诸般地质活动 却迥然不同。

sentences.en: His study of eruptions over the past 300 years with Ben Mason of the University of Cambridge and colleagues reveals that volcanism varies with the seasons.
sentences.cn: 他和剑桥大学的本.梅森及其同事研究了过去300年来发生的火山喷发，研究显示火山活动随季节变化而不同。

sentences.en: If active volcanism were responsible then it would be a major discovery with important implications.
sentences.cn: 如果活火山作用可信,那么这将是一项具有重要意义的重大发现.

sentences.en: Once the volcanism has stopped as oxygen is adequate, animals will be awakened from the stasis.
sentences.cn: 一旦火山停止,氧气足够, 动物们将从停滞中被唤醒.

sentences.en: Pengxian deposit and the Masongling Formationformation are products of island arc volcanism in convergent plate boundary.
sentences.cn: 证据表明,马松岭组及其所赋存的铜矿床均为会聚性板块边界古火山岛弧的产物.

sentences.en: Periods of volcanism are indicated by the presence of pyroclastic material in the formation.
sentences.cn: 群系中火成碎屑物的存在表明了火山酌的形成年代.

words.tran_cn: 火山的；猛烈的；易突然发作的

trans.tran_en: those processes collectively that result in the formation of volcanoes and their products
